name: My Lost Peer
description:
It's a story about two gloves which have separated in a box. One of them, will do everything to find his half. He will explore and confront the environment of the box.

GGJ 2021 - Lost and Found : https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/my-lost-peer-7

Team 
  • Audrey Deman : Game Design, Level Design
  • Florian Asencio : Game Design, Level Design
  • Raphael Bauvin : Program
  • Mark Tomlinson : Game Art
  • Naomi Gaye : Game Art & UI
Controls
